effect.black-white: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.black-2-white-2: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.black-white: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is scared off and switched. In the wild, a battle against a single Pokémon ends.
